title: Is this a picture of Piden and Harris in a group without face masks?
subtitle: Believe it or not, there was a time in the United States where facial masks were not required to slow the spread of a deadly disease.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: Photo showing former U.S. Vice President Joe Biden and Sin Kamala Harris without masks in August 2020, suggesting that they were mocking the public health guidelines during the COVID-19 epidemic.
